bibl.note: P. Paris Louvre Inv. E 3320; Nouveau No. 71 (= Pack2 78), 13-15. Supplements lines 13-15: krãthse g]år A‰sa pant«n | ka‹ PÒrow] geraitãtoi: | ¶gent' ép]°dilow ÉAlkã, "For the Destiny and the Path, the oldest of all, subdued them; their Defence proved to be shoeless", that is, exposed and unprotected, whence vulnerable and, by extension, insufficient and ineffective. <kratese g]ar Aisa panton | kai Poros] geraitatoi: | egent' ap]edilos Alka>
